query_template: How much energy is consumed by the nodes, racks, and machine over a given period of time?

variants.intent: Aggregate IT energy over time by scope
variants.query_text: How much energy is consumed by the nodes, racks, and machine over a given period of time?

query_template: How much energy is consumed by the cooling system (air and water) over a given period of time?

variants.intent: Measure facility-side cooling energy over time
variants.query_text: How much energy is consumed by the cooling system (air and water) over a given period of time?

query_template: What is the PUE (Power Usage Effectiveness) of a machine or compute room over a given period of time?

variants.intent: Compute PUE for a machine or room over time
variants.query_text: What is the PUE (Power Usage Effectiveness) of a machine or compute room over a given period of time?

query_template: How many jobs are running on a particular node over a given period of time?

variants.intent: Count concurrent jobs on a node over time
variants.query_text: How many jobs are running on a particular node over a given period of time?

query_template: Provide the distribution over time of the usage of resources (CPUs, GPUs, Memory) before a node fails, over a given period of time.

variants.query_text: Provide the distribution over time of the usage of resources (CPUs, GPUs, Memory) before a node fails, over a given period of time.

query_template: Give me the node’s resource utilization distribution when the PUE is higher than a given value.

variants.intent: Relate node utilization to high PUE conditions
variants.query_text: Give me the node’s resource utilization distribution when the PUE is higher than a given value.

query_template: Give me the node’s resource utilization distribution for a specific JobID whose job PUE is higher than a given value.

variants.query_text: Give me the node’s resource utilization distribution for a specific JobID whose job PUE is higher than a given value.

query_template: Give me the node’s resource utilization distribution for a specific JobID whose job power is higher than a given value.

variants.intent: Summarize utilization for all jobs exceeding a power threshold
variants.query_text: Give me the node’s resource utilization distribution for a specific JobID whose job power is higher than a given value.

query_template: Provide the node’s resource utilization (or users) distribution for all jobs whose node’s average job power is higher than a given value.

variants.query_text: Provide the node’s resource utilization (or users) distribution for all jobs whose node’s average job power is higher than a given value.
